FuncDef: The display service-location command displays service-location backup group information.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a service-location backup group with a specified index.
On a VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S, the value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255. On an LPUF-51-E/LPUI-51-E/LPUI-51-S, the value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16.

Examples: Current location slot ID: 1 engine ID: 0
Current backup slot ID: 2 engine ID: 0
ExtraInfo: To view information about a specific or all service-location backup groups, run the display service-location command. An index can be specified in this command to display information about the specified service-location backup group.
